document_data.name: Ulmyn Andalor
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulmyn Andalor''' was a miller in [[Bowshot]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ulmyn lived in the roadside hamlet of Bowshot, north of the [[The Way Inn|Way Inn]]. His sawmill was always busy and he traveled night and day.
document_data.Personality: Ulmyn was a simple man who liked efficiency. He was an expert in working different kinds of woods.
document_data.Rumors: Some said Ulmyn was once a noble's guard in [[Waterdeep]] until he had a liaison with the noble's daughter and decided to resettle in Bowshot to cover the scandal. The rumor may have also involved a child. Some others said that the noble's family had sent [[assassin]]s to kill Ulmyn. Others folks said Ulmyn was only the human cover for a monstrous creature.
